titleStmt.title: Newes from Poland. Wherein is truly inlarged the occasion, progression, and interception of the Turks formidable threatning of Europe. And particularly, the inuading of the kingdome of Poland. With many severall repulses he hath receiued from that braue and military nation: euen to this present moneth of October: as is truly collected out of the originall. Published by authority.

publicationStmt.publisher: imprinted by F. K. for B. D. and William Lee, and are to bee sold at his shop in Fleet-street, at the signe of the golden Buck, neere Serieants Inne,

notesStmt.note: Cf. STC 18507.35A which has imprint date 1621
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Fleet-street, at the signe of the golden Buck, neere Serieants Inne
